author: felicity
msg: bug 2851: when calling spamassassin -r and -k (report and revoke),
Bayes will see the modified message (ie: SA markup included), which is
a bad thing.  patched the functions to strip the markup pre-learn.

author: felicity
msg: bug 2847: Let CmdLearn determine if learning completed or failed.  If it failed, throw an error.

author: felicity
msg: bug 2847: Let CmdLearn know whether or not the learning attempt completed
or failed.  If it failed, throw an error and die.
